Simulation
==========

World Configuration
-------------------

The simulation uses the world file ``assignment.world`` with:

- Defined boundaries (-9 to 9 meters in x and y)
- Obstacle configuration
- Robot starting position

Robot Model
-----------

URDF files define the robot with:

- Laser scanner for obstacle detection
- Differential drive configuration
- Physical properties for Gazebo

RViz Configuration
------------------

Preconfigured RViz setups:

1. ``sim.rviz`` - Basic visualization
2. ``sim2.rviz`` - Enhanced visualization
